vsParam:
Well done, [px]!
You successfully synthesized the... "Pyroxene of Wisdom"!

With this... With this...
We can let everyone in the Academy...!

Exactly. You can let everyone in the Academy...
know what despair tastes like.

Thank you very much, [px].
It was grueling to make the "Pyroxene of Wisdom", wasn't it?

I'm sure it was strenuous to synthesize
with the fake recipe I gave you.

Fake recipe...!? What do you mean... Ah!?
The Pyroxene of Wisdom... is black...!?

That is the "Black Pyroxene of Wisdom". It's very similar to
the "Pyroxene of Wisdom" everyone knows, but they are different.

Ah! Give it back!
It's made by [px]!

Humph...
Let me put it to good use.

What's going on? Why is there so much noise...?
You, are you...

It's been a while, Jones Wort Sensei.
I'm glad to see you so spirited.

Today, I'm here to inform you that the Academy will be destroyed.
This ominous alchemical institution will be wiped out from the world.

Humph...!
I will not let such a thing happen...!

"Such a thing"...?
Compared with what you did, this is really nothing, isn't it?

Thanks to the "Black Pyroxene of Wisdom" made by [px],
... I can destroy the Academy easily.

Ah, m-monsters...!?
There are suddenly so many monsters in the... Academy!?

Hey, get the Guard here!
And summon all students who can fight!!

Ha ha ha ha! I'll leave now.
By the way...

Thank you, [px].
Thanks to you, this Academy is going down.
This is what alchemy is for.

Uh. Wait, [px]!?
Where are you going? Hey!!

Hey, [px]...
It has gone quiet outside...

They have defeated all the monsters, right...?
Let's go check it, [px]...

Are you troubled by what Calendula said...?
Don't take his words to heart...

He's a liar. He's been lying to us, don't you forget.
He's as evil as he looks.

We couldn't possibly know that he slipped in the
fake emerald board. So, this is not your fault, [px]...

[px], snap out of it...
If [px] remains like this, even I can't help...

Although we've defeated all the monsters,
it doesn't mean that Calendula is no longer a threat!

That guy will surely come back!
When he does, we'll need your power, [px]!

Exactly!
You're the one who has been guiding us, [px]!

So, we must overcome this crisis together!
[px], we must stay united!

You may think it's your fault.
But I can assure you no one in the Academy thinks that way!

We are worried about you!
We're all waiting for you to step out!

Although I'm not that familiar with your Academy life...
I can clearly feel the strong affinity among you.

And undoubtedly at the center of the affinity... is you, [px].
It's all because of you. So... Please don't give in!

You helped me find my place in this world. Without you, Senpai,
I couldn't have enjoyed my days in the Academy.

So... let's devote all our efforts to protecting this place!
All our important family members are right here...!

... Heehee, heeheehee.
Everyone is looking up to you!

[px], you won't give up now, right? You don't strike me
as someone who would give up their dreams!

Don't you want to become an excellent alchemist who
lives up to everyone's expectations? So—

[px]...!
Idiot, don't you ever make us worry like this again.

Yeah. Apologize to everyone now, [px]!
Tell everyone that you're sorry to have worried them!

Hehe. You coming out of your room is all that matters.
Don't blame yourself anymore, [px] Senpai.

Ha ha ha. Don't mention that...
Don't blame yourself anymore, [px] Senpai.

Hehe. You coming out of your room is all that matters.
Don't blame yourself anymore, [px] Senpai.

Ha ha ha. Don't mention that...
Don't blame yourself anymore, [px] Senpai.

... Oh, right.
What happened to... Calendula!?

He disappeared after that. This is really disturbing...
We're sparing no effort to search for him.

I see...! We must hurry to
find Calendula as well!

OK...!
Calendula, what you did is unforgivable...!

Yeah! Hehehe—!
Let's find and thrash him!

Exactly!
But why does Calendula hate alchemy so much...
